label: operatorParty
comment: A trade party who is an operator of this product handling process.
The operator party, such as terminal operator, service provider, network operator of this monitoring IOT device.
The party operating this logistics means of transport.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.
The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events that create, transform, or touch a product, such as manufacturing, treating, packaging, and storing.
